categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Shadday Potkin was a female human Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the final stages of the Clone Wars.

In 19 BBY, the final year of the war, Master Potkin, alongside fellow Jedi Melik Galerha, Ma'kis'shaalas and J'oopi Shé, attended a meeting in the Jedi briefing room regarding the Republic's siege of the Outer Rim.
